title: Miscellaneous Topics
summary: BioNTech partners with Bristol-Myers Squibb in a deal worth up to 11.1 billion, focusing on cancer treatments while continuing Covid vaccine collaboration with Pfizer.

title: Biontech Lifted Annual Sales
summary: BioNTech lifted its annual sales outlook, supported by stronger demand and momentum from its collaboration with Bristol-Myers Squibb, signaling renewed growth beyond Covid vaccine revenue. BNTX BMY PFE
